name: On and off
description:
A puzzlescript game about turning walls on and off whenever the player is next to their corresponding cube.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=f5b7ba44a147e370feeb7c1ed81f663f

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=f5b7ba44a147e370feeb7c1ed81f663f

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
